talk1.name: 2 Décadas de Progresso da IA (2000-19): os Novos Desafios
talk1.description: Os receios pelo mau uso da Inteligência Artificial (e da super inteligência) são hoje resolvidos com maior controlo, embora as promessas dos anos 70 estejam ainda longe de ter sido realizadas. No entanto, o maior poder de cálculo e de memória, melhores inteligências (algoritmos), e grande profundidade de procura e de aprendizagem permitem progressos sustentáveis nas áreas da saúde e da educação (muitos dados).

talk2.name: Let’s be Autonomous
talk2.description: Which car will you drive in the future? In this talk, we will give you a tour of current trends, challenges and technologies in the field of autonomous driving and what the future of mobility might look like. We'll walk you through a practical example to show you how Machine Learning is bringing us closer to this dream. Here at Bosch, you can help shape the future of mobility.

talk3.name: Gimme a job... I mean: How to get a tech internship?
talk3.description: Do you wanna work for the best tech companies or startups in the world? Well... Let me tell you something, getting your first job in technology is a pain and it's a hard thing! I interviewed with more than 10 companies before getting my job at Amazon. In this talk, I'm gonna share all the lessons I learned: From preparing your Resume, preparing the technical interviews (algorithms, problem solving), as well as sharing my own fun experiences doing on-site interviews. So if you wanna get your first internship or full-time job, this is your talk!

talk4.name: magIA @PRIMAVERA
talk4.description: Software de Gestão + Inteligência Artificial = Gestão Inteligente

workshop1.name: Hands-on workshop: Angular for frontend developers
workshop1.description: Exemplo prático da utilização do Angular no desenvolvimento de Web Applications.

talk1.name: Machine Learning Lifecycle in the Cloud
talk1.description: There's a lot of buzz around Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) in the technology world right now and every developer/business wants to sprinkle AI and ML in their lives. However, the whole process might seem daunting and discourage people from getting their hands dirty, as there's an endless list of steps might need to be taken as well as a big amount of computational resources needed in order to build a Machine Learning solution. But is this true? In this talk, we'll be exploring how cloud computing and tools built on top of it can be leveraged to play around with ML without previous knowledge or owning any physical servers.

talk2.name: IOT at Ubiwhere
talk2.description: Nos dias que correm quase todos os sistemas são passíveis de serem digitalizados, utilizando sensores e plataformas de controlo remoto para o efeito. Isto é, com o advento das Smart Cities, Industria 4.0, Smart Homes and Buildings, tudo é passível de ser digitalizado. Durante a talk, apresenta-se a forma como a Ubiwhere tem trabalhado o IoT com cidades e outras empresas, passando pela definição dos conceitos base que dão suporte à mesma e pela aplicabilidade prática que o IoT tem no âmbito das Smart Cities. A talk termina com a visão da Ubiwhere para o futuro: "The City Nervous System".

talk3.name: That first game I thought would be a hit! Vizati Post-Mortem
talk3.description: Jumping into game development and building that first game is always exciting, but what about the expectations? In this talk we'll talk about that first indie game I developed and had a bit of unrealistic expectations for a first project due to lack of experience and knowledge of how things actually worked.

talk4.name: Learning to Fly
talk4.description:
An introduction to Artificial Intelligence (AI), concepts, the most important paradigms, and the main areas of application. Machine learning: classical, reinforcement and deep (neuro).
 Why is AI fundamental to an organization?
 AI at ISlab @ ALGORITMI.
 The option of being relevant or irrelevant in the 21st century.
 Limitations, risks, trends, and expectations.
 An AI world.

workshop1.name: Rxjs on Quakes (Hands-On)
workshop1.description: RxJS is a library for reactive programming using Observables, making easier the composition of asynchronous and callback-based code.In this workshop, we will dive into the uses of this highly used library, and create a world earthquake map application demo.

talk1.name: Continuous Stuff
talk1.description: Continuous delivery is hard. At Utrust, we had various problems with lack of automations and proper UIs that non-technical team members could follow. With the release of Github Actions, a new CI powered by Github, we took the chance to revamp our whole flow. This is the story of how we now manage continuous deliveries, and of how awesome Github Actions can be to automate all kinds of tasks.

talk3.name: Remote work with Zapier
talk3.description: Learn how Zapier works successfully as a remote-only company with more than 300 people all over the world.

talk1.name: Design aberto e desenvolvimento iterativo na GitLab
talk1.description: Como trabalhamos na GitLab, concretamente na equipa de User Experience, através do caso de estudo do redesign da navegação do produto.

talk4.name: Cloud Delivery @KPMG
talk4.description: The process of migrating on-prem solutions to the cloud.

workshop1.name: Know your Beer – Microsoft Power Platform
workshop1.description: Neste workshop, vamos demonstrar o potencial da Microsoft Power Platform para endereçar desafios do dia-a-dia em várias indústrias num cenário de negócio, ao explorar como a Power Platform permite a criação de poderosas Business Apps dotadas de Inteligência Artificial (IA) com as mais recentes e inovadoras tecnologias da Microsoft. Este será um hands-on workshop, com demonstração em tempo-real do desenho de uma Power App capaz de identificar diferentes marcas de cerveja dentro de um dado ambiente, e mostrando os resultados visivelmente na App. O workshop explorará os componentes técnicos necessários à construção da App e, adicionalmente, o mecanismo de IA responsável por treinar um modelo inteligente capaz de identificar objetos. Junta-te a nós!

activityLeft.name: Developing Software for Digital Trucks
activityLeft.description: In a world where the logistics industry is getting more and more digital, the trucks need to keep up and digital services are now part of what we call a digital truck. To develop the software that gives life to the digital services cross functional teams are essential, from software engineers to UX/UI designers every single role is of the most importance to deliver a high quality product. I will talk about software development of a digital service, from the perspective of a software engineer inside an agile cross functional team working at the MAN | Digital Hub.

activityRight.name: Let’s be a DevOps Engineer
activityRight.description: O que é DevOps e o que faz um DevOps Engineer? Quais os principais desafios quando se integra o mundo do trabalho? Que opções tens e como fazer a melhor escolha? Estas são algumas das questões que irão ser abordadas nesta talk sobre como se preparar para o primeiro emprego em informática e como iniciar uma carreira como DevOps Engineer.

activityLeft.name: Do I need a hoodie to hack a bank?
activityLeft.description: Nesta talk o autor baseia a apresentação num serviço de intrusão fisica a uma conhecida instituição financeira com diversas "barreiras" de segurança. Com um cenário cheio de ação e com diversas personagens (nenhuma delas veste um hoodie), como será o desfecho deste tema tão "hollywoodesco"?
